response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to your success. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15,000. My proposal is to offer this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a unique opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
